text: @marklevinshow Who gives a rat's ass that President Obama took anti-malarial drugs in connection with his trip to Africa? How does that in any way challenge the idiocy of Trump erroneously thinking the same med has any effect on coronavirus? Or are you and your followers as stupid as rumored?
